The five kinds of sensual stimulation [m: Sights known by the eye that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Sounds known by the ear that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Smells known by the nose that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Tastes known by the tongue that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
Touches known by the body that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing
The drawbacks of sensual pleasures [mn14: Facing cold and heat, being hurt by the touch of flies, mosquitoes, wind, sun, and reptiles, and risking death from hunger and thirst
Sorrow and wail and lament, beating their breast and falling into confusion, when failing to earn any money
Pain and sadness when trying to protect wealth, and sorrow and wail and lament, beating their breast and falling into confusion, when losing it
Fighting, quarreling, arguing, and disputing, resulting in death and deadly pain
Being struck with arrows and spears, and their heads being chopped off, resulting in death and deadly pain
Being arrested and subjected to various punishments, resulting in death and deadly pain
Conducting oneself badly by way of body, speech, and mind, and being reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell
The capability of experiencing perfect h: Perfect happiness for one day and night without moving the body or speaking
